fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Public Health, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Health and social care policy and financing, education and training of health care professionals, HCA, migration, health care mobility, economic policy and European semester, trade agreements, EU directives concerning health and social care sector, taxation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Public Services International PSI 
European Public Service Unions EPSU 
NOFS 
Finnish Public Services Unions' Working Party FIPSU 
Finnish Confederation of Professionals STTK
goals__remit: Tehy is a trade union for qualiefied health care professonals, social workers and students of those professons in both public and private sector. Tehy campaingns for improvements and development in the fields of Finnish health and social care and influences education and labor force policies, also at EU level. Tehy looks after the interest of its members by negotiating and bargaining the collective agreements.
